When trying to create an extended dynamic web type project in IBM, we get the following error which blocks project creation:

java.lang.ClassCastException: java.lang.Object incompatible with java.lang.String
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.util.ComponentUtilities.getServerContextRoot(ComponentUtilities.java:267)
	at

Proposed patch is attached.  It looks like the ordering on the check for the error was backwards.  We should check for an error first, and if we have an error return null, otherwise, then check for a valid server context.
